MeasurementToolMetadata.Instructions: Please check the corresponding description that conveys how much you agree with each item.

erq_s_01.Description: When I want to feel more positive emotion (such as joy or amusement), I change the way I'm thinking about the situation.

erq_s_02.Description: I keep my emotions to myself.

erq_s_03.Description: When I want to feel less negative emotion (such as sadness or anger), I change the way I'm thinking about the situation.

erq_s_04.Description: I control my emotions by not expressing them.

erq_s_05.Description: I control my emotions by changing the way I think about the situation I'm in..

erq_s_06.Description: When I am feeling negative emotions. I make sure not to express them.

erq_s_cognitive_reappraisal_total.Description: Sum of the items comprising the 'cognitive reappraisal' subscale

erq_s_expressive_suppression_total.Description: Sum of the items comprising the 'expressive suppression' subscale

erq_s_total_score.Description: Global score comprised of the sum of the 'cognitive reappraisal' and 'expressive suppression' subscales
